lines.gurmukhi: byd ibrMic ibcwru n pwvq ckiRq syK isvwid Bey hY
lines.transliteration_english: Bayd Biranchi Bichaaru N Paavata , Chakrit Saykh Sivaadi Bhaay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Brahma studied and reflected on the Vedas yet could not fathom the beginning and the end of the infinite Lord. Sheshnag, with his thousand tongues and Shiv Ji are falling into ecstatic state singing His paeans and contemplating on His extent.

lines.gurmukhi: jog smwiD ArwDq nwrd swrd sukR snwq ney hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jog Samaadhi Araadhat Naarada , Saarad Soukr Sanaat Naay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Sage Narad, goddess Saraswati, Shukracharya and Sanatan the sons of Brahma are bowing before Him after contemplating on Him in meditation.

lines.gurmukhi: Awid Anwid Agwid Agocr nwm inrMjn jwp jey hY
lines.transliteration_english: Aadi Anaadi Agaadi Agochara , Naam Niranjan Jaap Jaay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The Lord who is since the beginning of the beginning, is beyond the beginning is spread beyond the comprehension of mind and senses. Such mammonless and blemishless Lord is being meditated upon by all.

lines.gurmukhi: sRI gurdyv sumyv susMgiq pYrI pey BweI pYrI pey hY ]554]
lines.transliteration_english: Sree Gurdayv Soumayv Sousangati , Pairee Paay Bhaaee Pairee Paay Hai ?554?

Shabad OS B.translation: The True Guru who is engrossed in such God is absorbed and permeated in the congregation of supreme people. 0 brother! I fall, yes I fall on the holy feet of such a True Guru.  (554)
